(There is a journal and a bowl hidden in the pile of rocks.

What could it be?)
<PCNAME> helped the people in the Isolation Camp.

I'm not feeling so good after I ran into that Murderwing.

The Mysterium say they have some kind of cure, but they don't have much, so they're only giving it a little at a time. I don't know when my turn will come.Read the next page.

Now they're saying our symptoms aren't bad enough to get the cure yet... but my skin is so dry and stiff!

I know that fleabane flowers are used to make skin cream... and there are a lot of them here.

I just need a little bit of milk to make the cream, and I'll feel so much better...

(You should report this to the Mysterium.)

(There's something else in the pile of rocks...)
(It's just an ordinary pile of rocks.)
(The ghostly figure points at the journal, then back toward the Isolation Camp.)

Thank you for bringing these, .

Fleabane is a vital ingredient for the anti-crystallization treatment... it's why we chose this place for the quarantine: a good supply of fleabane. We had a lot stored here in camp, but it went missing... and you saw how hard it was to gather more.

We'll get started on the next batch of treatment... but this can't keep happening. People are dying from this disease..."I know."

You've probably been exposed to more of the amber powder than anyone else alive. It's a wonder you're still able to move your limbs. The gods truly favor you.

Nevertheless, you should take the treatment, too.

It'll give you some temporary relief from the worst of the symptoms.

Do you have any idea who stole the fleabane in the first place? Or why?

The journal said something about a skin cream? And the ghost pointed at the camp?"That's right."

We can't be sure what the ghost meant, but it seems obvious that someone in the camp stole the fleabane.

It's a good thing you were here to get more. Otherwise, people might have succumbed to the disease before we could make more treatment.

Speaking of which, excuse me. I need to finish this batch.
